remarks: The Hilbert lattice is relatively atomic with respect to co-atoms (lattice hyperplanes).  Dual version of ~ hlrelat3 .  (Contributed by NM, 20-Jun-2012.)  (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
lhprelat3.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
lhprelat3.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
lhprelat3.s $e |- .< = ( lt ` K ) $.
lhprelat3.m $e |- ./\ = ( meet ` K ) $.
lhprelat3.c $e |- C = ( <o ` K ) $.
lhprelat3.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
lhprelat3N $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) /\ X .< Y ) -> E. w e. H ( X .<_ ( Y ./\ w ) /\ ( Y ./\ w ) C Y ) ) $.
$d ./\ w $.
$d .<_ w $.
$d C w $.
$d H w $.
$d K w $.
$d X w $.
$d Y w $.
